dataList.content: Dammit, they just won’t stop coming!
Keep this up and we'll be dead knackered before we even set foot in that bloody casino!
Don’t fret, Heathcliff. As long as the manager is with us, there’s no chance we’ll die from fatigue—
You think I don’t KNOW that, you %#@&**?!
The solution is simple: Any organization can be brought down by killing its leader. Smash the head in, and the sack of meat propping it up will also collapse.
Now that's what I like to hear. You're the only one makin' sense out of this lot.
I’m proper miffed, so let’s go break something—bones, heads, whatever.
Come, then! Onward we travail!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Wait! Get back here, all of you!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: ... This is the crowd you’re supposed to accompany, Faust?
Life is full of mysteries.
That, perhaps, is what makes it an ideal reflection, no?
Tell me where your gaffer is! I wanna see ‘im, now!
Heathcliff seized a Tingtanger by the collar and shook him about violently, even as it seemed the man's last shred of consciousness was quickly leaving him...
... possibly to never return.

dataList.title: Tingtang Gang
dataList.content: The sea heart… should be at the car pagoda…
The what? Where the hell is that?! Start making sense, or else...!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: He probably means the scrapyard nearby.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: But seriously—are you actually planning to take out Tingtang's Boss?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: You do realize that won't earn you anything on your employee performance review, right?
He’s not sharp enough to factor in such things before he acts.
Indeed. He is also a pile of refuse, far removed from schemes or forethought—and quite acquainted with absurdities.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Actually… His plan might be a valid alternative.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Nothing to worry about, Effie. We always keep a Plan B, don’t we?
Saude said with a gentle smile on her face.
Though Saude spoke calmly, I caught the faint cracks beneath the veneer of composure—like she was making a huge effort just to hold herself together.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: If disguising yourselves as your given roles is no longer an option...

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Then you can pose as members of the Tingtang Gang instead.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: That way, you won't draw much suspicion even if you move together as a group. You should be able to reach the top floor without much trouble, too.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: And while we're at it, maybe we can siphon a bit of wishpower from the Tingtang Gang as well.
